price: Jedhi: “dachiiniifi isaan ishee keessa jiran kan eenyuti? Yoo kan beektan taatan”
arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul limani al-arḍu waman fīhā in kuntum taʿlamūna
